name: Venice Canal Smart Home
description: Ultra-modern smart home situated on Venice Beach's historic canals. This architectural marvel combines cutting-edge technology with waterfront living, featuring AI-powered home systems and sustainable design elements.
details:
4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, rooftop deck. Features include:
- AI-powered home systems
- Solar glass windows
- Private dock
- Electric boat
- Vertical garden
- Self-maintaining pool

name: Coastal Haven Estate
description: Magnificent beachfront estate with private beach access and stunning sunset views. This Mediterranean-inspired villa features hand-crafted details, imported materials, and resort-style outdoor living spaces. Perfect for those seeking the ultimate coastal lifestyle.
details:
6 bedrooms, 7.5 bathrooms, guest house. Features include:
- Infinity edge pool
- Private beach pathway
- Outdoor kitchen
- Wine room
- 4-car garage
- Staff quarters

name: Urban Oasis Loft
description: Historic warehouse conversion in the arts district featuring original architectural elements and modern luxuries. Soaring 16-foot ceilings, exposed brick, and steel beams create an authentic industrial-chic atmosphere.
details:
2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, home office. Features include:
- Original hardwood floors
- Custom steel staircases
- Gourmet kitchen
- Artist's studio space
- Smart home features
- Secured parking

name: Mountain Vista Lodge
description: Spectacular mountain retreat with panoramic views of the Rockies. This timber-frame masterpiece combines rustic charm with modern luxury, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase the natural surroundings.
details:
5 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, separate guest cabin. Features include:
- Indoor/outdoor living spaces
- Stone fireplaces
- Game room
- Home theater
- Ski room
- Heated driveway

name: Garden District Victorian
description: Meticulously restored 1890s Victorian mansion in the historic Garden District. This architectural gem features original millwork, stained glass windows, and modern updates that respect its historic character.
details:
6 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, carriage house. Features include:
- Wrap-around porch
- Period details
- Modern kitchen
- Butler's pantry
- Garden cottage
- Historic fixtures

name: Sunset Valley Ranch
description: Working ranch estate on 100 acres with modern amenities and incredible mountain views. Perfect for equestrian enthusiasts or those seeking a luxury country lifestyle with income potential.
details:
4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, multiple outbuildings. Features include:
- Equestrian facilities
- Barn with 10 stalls
- Indoor riding arena
- Staff quarters
- Organic gardens
- Solar power system

name: Smart City Micro-Apartment
description: Innovative micro-apartment featuring cutting-edge space-saving solutions and smart home technology. Perfect for modern urban professionals seeking efficiency without sacrificing style.
details:
Studio, 1 bathroom, 400 sq ft. Features include:
- Transforming furniture
- Smart storage solutions
- High-end appliances
- Voice-controlled systems
- Building amenities
- Bike storage

name: Lakefront Contemporary
description: Stunning contemporary home on Lake Washington with private dock and water views from every room. Featuring walls of glass, floating staircases, and seamless indoor-outdoor living spaces.
details:
4 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, boat house. Features include:
- Private dock
- Infinity pool
- Home automation
- Glass elevator
- Wine cellar
- Home gym

name: Desert Oasis Compound
description: Architectural masterpiece in the Sonoran Desert featuring rammed earth construction and sustainable design. Seamlessly blends with the natural landscape while offering ultimate luxury and comfort.
details:
3 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, guest casita. Features include:
- Solar power system
- Natural cooling design
- Infinity edge pool
- Meditation garden
- Art studio
- Desert landscaping

name: Riverside Eco-Community Home
description: Modern eco-friendly home in an award-winning sustainable community. Features advanced green technology and community amenities while maintaining a luxurious lifestyle.
details:
3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, community spaces. Features include:
- Geothermal heating/cooling
- Living roof
- Community gardens
- Shared electric vehicles
- Rainwater harvesting
- Energy monitoring

name: Historic Brownstone
description: Beautifully renovated 19th-century brownstone in Boston's Back Bay. This historic gem combines period architecture with contemporary conveniences and luxury finishes.
details:
4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, garden level. Features include:
- Original moldings
- Marble fireplaces
- Chef's kitchen
- Private garden
- Wine cellar
- Smart home features

name: Skyline Penthouse Suite
description: A breathtaking penthouse offering 360-degree city views from the 45th floor. This ultra-luxury residence features smart home integration throughout, a private elevator lobby, and designer finishes. The double-height ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows create an unparalleled sense of space and luxury.
details:
3 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, 3,200 sq ft. Features include:
- Private rooftop terrace
- Wine cellar
- Chef's kitchen with Miele appliances
- Home automation system
- Private elevator access
- 24/7 concierge service

name: Treehouse Retreat
description: Luxury treehouse complex built among ancient redwoods. This unique property offers an elevated living experience with high-end amenities while being completely immersed in nature. Perfect for those seeking an extraordinary living space.
details:
2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, suspended bridges. Features include:
- Glass floor panels
- Spiral staircases
- Outdoor shower
- Meditation platforms
- Sustainable materials
- Forest viewing decks

name: Manhattan Sky Loft
description: Duplex penthouse in a converted Art Deco building with 360-degree Manhattan views. Features restored original details combined with ultra-modern amenities and a private rooftop garden.
details:
3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, library. Features include:
- Art Deco details
- Private elevator
- Smart glass windows
- Rooftop greenhouse
- Home theater
- Professional kitchen

name: Alpine Glass House
description: Contemporary glass house in the Swiss Alps with retractable walls and heated glass technology. This engineering masterpiece offers unobstructed mountain views while maintaining perfect comfort in any weather.
details:
4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, spa level. Features include:
- Retractable glass walls
- Indoor-outdoor pool
- Helicopter pad
- Ski-in access
- Smart climate control
- Underground garage

name: Converted Lighthouse Estate
description: Historic lighthouse transformed into a luxury residence on Maine's rocky coast. This unique property combines maritime history with modern comfort, offering spectacular ocean views and private beach access.
details:
3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, observation deck. Features include:
- 360° observation deck
- Original lighthouse mechanics
- Private beach
- Guest cottage
- Storm watching room
- Marine room

name: Underground Desert Villa
description: Innovative underground villa in Arizona's desert, featuring natural cooling and heating systems. This eco-friendly home maintains perfect temperature year-round while offering luxury amenities and stunning desert views.
details:
3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, central courtyard. Features include:
- Natural cooling system
- Desert gardens
- Glass ceiling panels
- Underground garage
- Wine cave
- Recording studio

name: Floating Lake House
description: Contemporary floating home on Lake Union with self-sustaining systems and 360-degree water views. This unique property combines innovative marine architecture with luxury living.
details:
2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, water deck. Features include:
- Self-leveling system
- Underwater viewing room
- Solar panels
- Water collection system
- Expandable deck
- Fish feeding station

name: Converted Church Loft
description: Gothic revival church converted into a spectacular modern residence. Features soaring 40-foot ceilings, original stained glass windows, and contemporary additions that complement the historic architecture.
details:
2 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, bell tower study. Features include:
- 40-foot ceilings
- Original stained glass
- Mezzanine level
- Church organ
- Modern kitchen
- Artist's studio

name: Volcanic Island Villa
description: Exclusive villa built into a volcanic cliff in Santorini. This masterpiece of architecture offers cave-style living spaces, infinity pools, and breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea.
details:
4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, wine cave. Features include:
- Infinity edge pools
- Cave spa
- Volcanic rock features
- Private helipad
- Wine cellar
- Outdoor cinema

name: Bamboo Forest Compound
description: Sustainable luxury compound built entirely from bamboo in Bali's sacred forests. This architectural wonder showcases the versatility of sustainable materials while providing modern luxuries.
details:
5 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, meditation pavilion. Features include:
- Bamboo architecture
- River access
- Yoga pavilion
- Organic garden
- Natural pool
- Recording studio
